Class TrustedCertificateDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao.AbstractCloudDao
      • com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao.AbstractModelDao<TrustedCertificate>
        • com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.security.model.TrustedCertificateDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloudDao, CreateDao<TrustedCertificate>, CrudDao<TrustedCertificate>, DeleteDao<TrustedCertificate>, ModelDao<TrustedCertificate>, ReadDao<TrustedCertificate>, UpdateDao<TrustedCertificate>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Cloneable

    @Preamble(description="Data Access Object (DAO) for trusted certificates.")
public class TrustedCertificateDao
extends AbstractModelDao<TrustedCertificate>
implements CrudDao<TrustedCertificate>
    Data Access Object (DAO) for trusted certificates.

    See Also:
    Core J2EE Patterns - Data Access Object
